1.18.1.1.4.2: Scaled down font size of item stack counts
1.18.1.1.5.0: Ported to 1.18.  Performance increase: ItemStacks are no longer repeatedly copied while doing sorting/imports/exports, reducing RAM use/CPU load.  Cables can all be now water-loggable. Storage Request Table now correctly drops items from crafting grid when broken.
1.18.1.1.5.1: Jei got released for 1.18 so enable that plugin
1.18.1.1.5.2: Ported to 1.18.1. Fixed cables not saving settings such as filter and priority.  Created italian translation #408 by maicol07 .  Bugfixes for Network Collector Remote #411 #394 by Samsterious
